comment: **$**He creates a LAID-BACK style teaching. One may enjoy his classes. His gradin is more STERN. So pay attention to punctuation etc. ALL & ALL, the SIMPLER & more CLEARER you write your essays the better grade you'll get. Attend classes ON-TIME, write your journals for at least a MONTH (he WON'T COLLECT IT AFTER that) & you'll get a sure A or B!

seriously, just get him to like you and you will get an A. I made B's and C's on all the projects, but at the end of the semester got an A. The projects were pretty difficult because he will not tell you what he's looking for talk to him about whatever he's interested in. If you're a girl, he's pretty dang creepy.

His teaching methods are unique but not all that effective.  If you take him make sure he likes you because you'll get in an A in the class.  Grading is detailed but mostly fair.  Overall was a decent class, just glad its done.

Great professor.  He was always willing to help read my papers before I turned them in and gave excellent feedback.  He accepted every paper up until the last day of class with no penalty.  He can tell a lot of stories that seem off-topic though.
Great teacher and I  throughly enjoyed the class.  Some projects take a great deal of work, but college is not supposed to be easy. He makes class very interesting and is not a typical stiff teacher.
Never had as much response from a teacher.  He is hard, and for that reason I learned a lot, and I realized what a joke my writing instruction and experiences were in school.
Had him on Engl. 1102 and was a good experience. This Class took a looot of reading but in general was ok. Same old go to class and do HW. Again nice guy and helpfull

Great Professor!! He is the type of prof. that will make the class fun. Sometimes he makes comments that you will only hear from a buddy. The Good thing its that he let you have fun in class and make jokes. Work level its ok. And his grades are fair

He seems laid back so far. Very nice and makes the class entertaining with his energy. However, he gives alot of assignments. Usually puts you on the spot in the class which gets you emabarrased. Old Fashioned. it already seems like he plays favorites with other students. get on his good side if you want a good grade. he isn't very well organized
